titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 72) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2006, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-301, by Mr. Putnam.
Sec. 2. House Resolution 542 is laid on the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 120.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 558.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - The Chair put the question on adoption of the resolution and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Putnam demanded the yeas and nays. The Chair announced that the yeas and nays were ordered and subsequently postponed further proceedings on the question of adoption of the resolution until later in the legislative day.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 407 - 21 (Roll no. 595).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/17/2005--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 72) making further continuing appropriations for FY2006.
